content.rendered:
Co-curricular Activities

CGB offers a unique co-curricular programme

Through creative timetabling, all students take part in our co-curricular activities (CCAs) during the school day.  Wall climbing, swimming, SCUBA diving, photography, French cooking and robotics are just a few of the activities on offer.

Additionally, the CGB football, basketball, volleyball and rugby teams train during this time to prepare them for inter-collegiate competitions, as well as our inter-house events.  Through the co-curricular programme, balance is promoted and students are encouraged to move out of their comfort zones to experiment with something unknown, developing new interests.

FS-KS1 KS2 SECONDARY
Swimming / Natación Tennis / Tenis Tennis - Advanced Level / Tenis - Nivel avanzado
Children's Gymnastics / Gimnasia Infantil Swimming / Natación Tennis - Basic Level / Tenis - Nivel básico
Football / Fútbol Wallclimbing / Escalada en muro Swimming / Natación
Arts & Crafts / Arte y manualidades Football / Fútbol Wallclimbing / Escalada en muro
Mindfulness Mandalas / Mandalas Volleyball / Voleibol Football / Fútbol
How to draw step by step? / ¿Cómo dibujar paso a paso? Basketball / Baloncesto Volleyball / Voleibol
Lego Book club / Club de lectura Basketball / Baloncesto
Karate Lego Music Band / Banda musical
Roller Blading (Y-2 Students) / Patinaje Mindfulness Mandalas / Mandalas School Production - Producción escolar
Dance / Danza Animal Club / Club de animales Arts and Crafts / Arte y manualidades
Wallclimbing / Escalada en muro Chess / Ajedres Bowling / Bolos
Crafts with recyclable materials / Manualidades con materiales reciclables Roller Blading / Patinaje Lego
Origami Cricket Ping - Pong / Tenis de mesa
Mandalas and board games/mandalas y juegos de mesa Holiday crafts Chess / Ajedrez
Yoga Junior Production Squash
Calming Watercolor Art A story to tell: Reading and storytelling/ Una historia que contar. Golf
Social Club Karate Field Hockey
Arts and creativity / Arte y creatividad Rugby
Cheerleaders Danzas-Cheers
Cooking Electric Guitar / Guitarra eléctrica
Yoga Digital Art / Arte digital
Tutoring and study time (Year 9)/ Tiempo de estudio y tutorías (Año 9)
Animal Club / Club animal
Stop motion animation - Animated Movies
Cine and book Club / Club de lectura y cine
Cooking
Yoga and mindfullness
Digital Photography
Model United Nations
